GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.12.9
GSD.description:
spi: spi-fsl-dspi: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.9 by commit 12391be4724acc9269e1845ccbd881df37de4b56, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit 90ba37033cb94207e97c4ced9be575770438213b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: spi: spi-fsl-dspi: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path
